name: United Security Life Insurance, Etc., Co., Appellant v. Brown
name_abbreviation: United Security Life Insurance v. Brown

parties: United Security Life Insurance, Etc., Co., Appellant v. Brown

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Mr. Justice Sadler,
It was stipulated by paper filed that the same judgment should be entered as in the preceding appeal, involving, as it does, the same parties and legal questions.
The judgment is affirmed.
opinions.author: Mr. Justice Sadler,

casebody.head_matter:
United Security Life Insurance, Etc., Co., Appellant v. Brown
(No. 1A).
Appeal No. 2, January T., 1921.
April 18, 1921:
